Product features

target: To send an email or text with Notify, you need to create a reusable message template first.

source: Templates let you send the same thing to lots of people, as often as you need, without writing a new message each time.
Notification makes it easy to send personalized messages from a single template.
target: Notify makes it easy to send personalized messages from a single template.

source: If you want to include personalized content in your message, you can add a placeholder.  Each time you send a message, you can fill the placeholder with details such as a name or reference number. You can do this manually or upload a list of personal details and let Notification do it for you.
target: If you want to include personalized content in your message, you can add a placeholder. Each time you send a message, you can fill the placeholder with details such as a name or reference number. You can do this manually or upload a list of personal details and let Notify do it for you.

source: To send a batch of messages at once, upload a list of contact details to Notification. You can also schedule the date and time for sending emails or text messages.
You can integrate Notification’s API with your web application or back-office system to send messages automatically.
target: You can integrate Notify’s API with your web application or back-office system to send messages automatically.

target: Notify has the following types of message status (API message status may be different and is found in

source: Notification has sent the message to the email provider.
target: Notify has sent the message to the email provider.

source: The message was successfully delivered. Notification will not tell you if a user has opened or read a message.
target: The message was successfully delivered. Notify will not tell you if a user has opened or read a message.

source: The provider could not deliver the message because the email address was wrong. You should remove these email addresses from your database.
The provider could not deliver the message after trying for 72 hours. This can happen when the recipient’s inbox is full. You can try to send the message again.
There was a connection problem between Notification and the email provider. You’ll have to try sending your messages again.
target: There was a connection problem between Notify and the email provider. You’ll have to try sending your messages again.

source: Notification has sent the message to the cellular provider.
target: Notify has sent the message to the cellular provider.

source: The message was sent to an international number. The mobile networks in some countries do not provide any more delivery information.

The provider could not deliver the message because the phone number was wrong. You should remove these phone numbers from your database. You’ll still be charged for text messages to numbers that do not exist.

The provider could not deliver the message after trying for 72 hours. This can happen when the recipient’s phone is off. You can try to send the message again. You’ll still be charged for text messages to phones that are not accepting messages.

There was a connection problem between Notification and the cellular provider. You’ll have to try sending your messages again. You will not be charged for text messages that are affected by a technical failure.
target: There was a connection problem between Notify and the cellular provider. You’ll have to try sending your messages again. You will not becharged for text messages that are affected by a technical failure.

source: Send service updates by email and text message
Try out Notify, a new messaging platform for the Government of Canada.

Send emails or text messages to keep the public informed and
            make your services more transparent.

Use templates for easy,
            consistent, and accessible communications.

Staff who regularly write and send service updates wishing
              to upgrade the tools used to communicate with the public

Developers working on improving workflow and tooling for
              public servants

Administrators who have to meet departmental service
              standards for communication
Upload mailing lists and send personalized messages in bulk
Create templates and save them for future messages
Track the status of the messages you send
See how Notify can improve your workflow
You can integrate Notify with your current system to take advantage of its secure, cloud-based messaging tools.
Notify supports roles and permissions, so that you can adjust which staff have access to send or edit messages.
Notify is free for Government of Canada services
Use Notify for free and replace paper letters or costly third-party messaging services.
Notify is a service managed by the Canadian Digital Service — no external procurement.

We’ll send your organisation an invoice each quarter if you:
If your organisation has more than one service, you'll see a breakdown of each service on your invoice.
If the value of an invoice is less than £250 (before <abbr title="Value Added Tax">VAT</abbr>), we’ll add it to the total for the next quarter to save time and effort.
You can pay by BACS, debit card, or credit card.
If your organisation’s estimated spend is more than £500 per year (before <abbr title="Value Added Tax">VAT</abbr>), you need to send us a purchase order (PO).
Your organisation should raise a single <abbr title="purchase order">PO</abbr> for the estimated cost of all its services. You can update the PO anytime if your usage increases.
You may need to set up the Cabinet Office as a supplier before you can raise a <abbr title="purchase order">PO</abbr>.
